page.title: 12Tal_y_Bont Village
page.content: Tal_y_Bont is two miles south east of Bangor; it is a fairly small village & there is a nice friendly community atmosphere amongst the people. Most of the people live in the new housing estate that was built in 1973. People shop for ordinary things e.g.bread,milk,eggs, in the local post office which recently moved three houses further down the road. Most people have a car & go to Bangor or Llandudno to shop. Around the post office the houses are mainly built from local stone & slate but a few yards up the road there is the housing estate where the houses are built from cement bricks & blocks with slate roofs.
